Projects

Unplugged Project

"This website is built using Flexbox, ensuring a responsive design that seamlessly adjusts to different screen sizes, from desktops to mobile devices. It features multiple sections, including a card-style layout that organizes content in a structured, visually appealing way. With a keen focus on responsive design and modular layouts, this setup makes navigation intuitive while maintaining a clean and modern aesthetic. The site’s flexibility allows it to be adapted for various purposes, such as blogs, portfolios, and online stores. The use of smooth alignment and spacing ensures a polished look, enhancing readability and usability across all devices. Designed with user-friendliness in mind, this project showcases practical implementation of Flexbox principles, demonstrating expertise in crafting adaptable, professional web experiences. "

Skills: "CSS3, HTML5, Flexbox, Media Queries, Responsive Typography"

Tools: "GitHub, Text editors "

Github Repo Gallery

"This website shows my GitHub projects in an easy-to-browse gallery. It automatically pulls details about each project, like the name and description, using GitHub’s API. Visitors can click on a project to see more information and go to the GitHub page. The site looks good on all screen sizes, making it simple to explore my work from any device"

Skills: "Javascript"

Tools: "REST API, Github Pages"

LIVE PAGE

Guess the Word Game

" Guess the Word is a classic letter-guessing game that challenges players to uncover a hidden word, one letter at a time. With a limited number of guesses, players must strategically choose their letters to reveal the word before running out of attempts. It's a fun way to test vocabulary and deduction skills! "

Skills: "Javascript"

Tools: "GitHub Pages, JSON"

LIVE PAGE

Sticky Notes

This app helps you quickly create and manage sticky notes on your computer, making it easy to remember important tasks and to-do items. You can add, edit, and delete notes whenever you need. The app is built using JavaScript (ES6) and React (JSX) for smooth performance. It organizes information efficiently by updating the webpage dynamically. I used CodeSandbox, an online coding tool, to develop and test this project.

Skills:"ES6, JSX, Managing data flow, Manipulate the DOM"

Tools"CodeSandbox"

LIVE PAGE

Rogue Pickings

"Rogue Pickings is a fun and interactive game where players navigate through a maze, collecting items while avoiding enemies. The game is designed to be engaging and challenging, with various levels of difficulty. Players can use their skills to strategize and outsmart the enemies, making it an exciting experience for all ages."
